summary:
The script defines a `GitWrapper` class method `get_previous_release` that retrieves the most recent release tag from a Git repository based on a specified release type (`minor` or `patch`). It scans all tag references, extracts semantic version numbers, filters out non‑semantic or pre‑release tags (excluding ​ ​ ​ ​ ​​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​​ ​ ​ ​​ ​ ​​​  ), and, for a `minor` release, further narrows down to tags with a micro (patch) component ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​  = 0 ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​.
